column2: title=After the King: Stories In Honor of J.R.R. Tolkien

column1: '''''After the King: Stories In Honor of J.R.R. Tolkien''''', is a Festschrift anthology published to celebrate the centenary of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s birth. The book contains nineteen short stories of fantasy and science fiction, and also includes an introduction on the role of Tolkien for the genre of fantasy.
*Note: None of the short stories are set in, or directly related to, Tolkien's [[legendarium]].
*"Long Night's Vigil at the Temple" ([[wikipedia:Robert Silverberg
*"In the Season of the Dressing of the Wells" ([[wikipedia:John Brunner (novelist)
*"The Fellowship of the Dragon" ([[wikipedia:Patricia A. McKillip
*"Conjure Man" ([[Charles de Lint]]; story starts with a quote from Tolkien)
*"Up the Side of the Air" ([[Karen Haber]])
*"Revenge of the Sugar Plum Fairies" ([[wikipedia:Mike Resnick
